# 2. Community Expectations
- Follow the community expectations. This includes both in game and elsewhere in our community. - Don't be a dick nor harass other players. - Do not evade bans. - Don't be racist or bigoted. - Do not attempt to cause lag to the server. - Do not grief as a non-antagonist; this includes against AFK and SSD/Catatonic Players. - Do not leave the server to avoid punishment from Admin staff. - Do not respawn to avoid punishment from Security Forces, or respawn as the same character if given a permanent confinement sentence. - Exploits, abusing bugs, cheating, power-gaming, and other extremely lame behavior are forbidden.
